zh.title: 心沐六和
zh.subtitle: 念和在心·归和而明
zh.signature: 心沐日月，与光同曜，随江河起落，合天地吐纳，偕四时流转，共万物生息
zh.description: 在这个快节奏的时代，我们常常迷失在外在的纷扰中，忘记了内心的声音。心沐六和，是一次深入内心的探索之旅，带您从内在觉醒到宇宙和谐，走上一条完整的修行之路。
zh.poeticText: 以“合”为途，以“和”为归，从“和”开始，向“和”归去，在融合中前行，于和谐中抵达。循合而行，归和而息，和起于心，归于万物。朝和而行，与万物共鸣。

en.title: Ximory Six Harmonies
en.subtitle: Harmony in Mind · Clarity in Return
en.signature: Ximory Sun and Moon, shining with light, illuminating the true heart, harmonizing all phenomena
en.description: In this fast-paced era, we often lose ourselves in external distractions, forgetting our inner voice. Ximory Six Harmonies is a journey of deep inner exploration, guiding you from inner awakening to cosmic harmony on a complete path of cultivation.
en.poeticText: Harmony arises from the heart, heart from thought, thought from awareness, awareness from emptiness. Empty yet not empty, existing yet not existing, harmonious yet not harmonious - this is the Great Harmony.

zh.title: 自我和
zh.imagery: 向上 • 生长 • 整合
zh.realm: 内省成镜 • 心光自明
zh.path: 自省一念 • 练习「自我和」
zh.motto: 觉察自我本心 • 开启生命觉醒
zh.enlightenment: 返观自我 • 穿越阻隔 • 回归本真
zh.heartWords: 脱下伪装，活出真实，看似脆弱，却无比自在。
zh.interpretation: 与内在自我对话，让情绪、认知与行动保持一致，减少内耗，活出真实的自己。

en.title: Self Harmony
en.realm: Self-reflection becomes mirror • Heart light self-illuminating
en.path: Self-reflection in one thought • Practice "Self Harmony"
en.motto: Perceive true self • Awaken life consciousness
en.enlightenment: Return to observe self • Transcend barriers • Return to authenticity
en.heartWords: Remove disguise, live authentically, seemingly fragile, yet infinitely free.
en.interpretation: Dialogue with inner self, keep emotions, cognition and actions consistent, reduce internal friction, live authentically.

zh.title: 社会和
zh.imagery: 桥梁 • 镜像 • 秩序
zh.realm: 外连成桥 • 众生无隔
zh.path: 理解一瞬 • 铺垫「社会和」
zh.motto: 建立真实连接 • 融入社会网络
zh.enlightenment: 定位自身 • 映照他者 • 建构秩序
zh.heartWords: 减少内耗，保持坦然；彼此共鸣，彼此成就。
zh.interpretation: 在与他人的交往中保持平衡，不被外界裹挟，也不刻意对抗。

en.title: Social Harmony
en.realm: External connections form bridges • No barriers between beings
en.path: Understanding in an instant • Laying foundation for "Social Harmony"
en.motto: Establish authentic connections • Integrate into social networks
en.enlightenment: Position self • Reflect others • Construct order
en.heartWords: Reduce internal friction, maintain equanimity; mutual resonance, mutual achievement.
en.interpretation: Maintain balance in interactions with others, neither swept away by external forces nor deliberately opposing.

zh.title: 自然和
zh.imagery: 呼吸 • 叶脉 • 水滴
zh.realm: 外采成流 • 四时入怀
zh.path: 顺应一息 • 回归「自然和」
zh.motto: 顺应自然之道 • 人与环境共生
zh.enlightenment: 顺应节律 • 滋养身心 • 融入生态
zh.heartWords: 随江河起落，合天地吐纳；偕四时流转，共万物生息。
zh.interpretation: 顺应四时节律，与自然界保持呼应，让身心在环境中得以复原与滋养。

en.title: Nature Harmony
en.realm: External gathering flows • Four seasons embrace
en.path: Follow one breath • Return to "Nature Harmony"
en.motto: Follow the way of nature • Humans and environment coexist
en.enlightenment: Follow rhythm • Nourish body and mind • Integrate into ecology
en.heartWords: Rise and fall with rivers, breathe with heaven and earth; flow with four seasons, live with all beings.
en.interpretation: Follow seasonal rhythms, resonate with nature, let body and mind restore and nourish in the environment.

zh.title: 能量和
zh.imagery: 心跳 • 燃烧 • 内核
zh.realm: 内炼成炉 • 能量充盈
zh.path: 调养一日 • 充盈「能量和」
zh.motto: 积蓄内在力量 • 稳步持续成长
zh.enlightenment: 点燃之火 • 蓄养根基 • 稳定气场
zh.heartWords: 回归身体的根，守住生命的气。
zh.interpretation: 调顺身体核心的生理与心理联结，让呼吸、气血与意识同频，稳住生命的"根"。

en.title: Energy Harmony
en.realm: Internal cultivation becomes furnace • Energy abundant
en.motto: Accumulate inner strength • Steady continuous growth
en.enlightenment: Ignite the fire • Cultivate foundation • Stabilize energy field
en.heartWords: Return to the root of body, guard the qi of life.
en.interpretation: Harmonize core physiological and psychological connections, synchronize breath, qi-blood and consciousness, stabilize the "root" of life.

zh.title: 共频和
zh.imagery: 信号 • 链接 • 协同
zh.realm: 内合成一 • 同频共振
zh.path: 同频一场 • 凝聚「共频和」
zh.motto: 系统同频共振 • 形成协同合力
zh.enlightenment: 调频共振 • 凝聚合力 • 系统成形
zh.heartWords: 在同频共振中，我们共舞、共生、共创、共进、共赢、共享，共鸣于心，共存于世。
zh.interpretation: 让个体与群体、系统、智能体在频率上共振，实现资源与力量的最佳流动。

en.title: Frequency Harmony
en.path: Synchronize in one field • Gather "Frequency Harmony"
en.motto: System synchronized resonance • Form collaborative synergy
en.enlightenment: Tune resonance • Gather synergy • System formation
en.heartWords: In synchronized resonance, we dance together, live together, create together, advance together, win together, share together, resonate in heart, coexist in world.
en.interpretation: Let individuals, groups, systems, and intelligent entities resonate in frequency, achieving optimal flow of resources and power.

zh.title: 无我和
zh.imagery: 无限 • 裂变 • 奇点
zh.realm: 无边无际 • 无处不在
zh.path: 放下一心 • 抵达「无我和」
zh.motto: 消融自我边界 • 融入无限整体
zh.enlightenment: 源于空寂 • 涵容万物 • 自然无碍
zh.heartWords: 不再执着于存在，我开始真正存在。
zh.interpretation: 超越自我限定，融入万物的自由流动，无内无外，无边无际；无拘无束，无处不在；心无所往，自然而然，生生不息。

en.title: Selfless Harmony
en.path: Let go of one mind • Reach "Selfless Harmony"
en.motto: Dissolve self boundaries • Merge into infinite wholeness
en.enlightenment: Origin from emptiness • Embrace all things • Natural unobstructed
en.heartWords: No longer attached to existence, I begin to truly exist.
en.interpretation: Transcend self-limitation, merge into the free flow of all things, no inside no outside, boundless; unrestrained, omnipresent; mind goes nowhere, natural and spontaneous, endless vitality.

zh.title: 心沐六和：实践｜让和谐成为一种生活方式
zh.subtitle: 将六和体系融入日常生活
zh.excerpt: 和谐不仅是一种理念，更是一种可以实践的生活方式。通过日常的修行和觉察，我们可以将六和体系融入到生活的每一个细节中，让和谐成为我们存在的自然状态。

en.title: Ximory Six Harmonies: Practice | Making Harmony a Way of Life
en.subtitle: Integrating the Six Harmonies System into Daily Life
en.excerpt: When it becomes a habit, 'harmony' will naturally flow through our every word, action, thought, and intention.

zh.title: 心沐六和：延伸｜形意和谐之美
zh.subtitle: 探索形式与意义的完美统一
zh.excerpt: 形意和谐是六和体系的延伸，探索形式与意义的完美统一。在美的体验中，我们感悟生命的真谛，发现存在的深层意义。

en.title: Ximory Six Harmonies: Extension | The Beauty of Form-Meaning Harmony
en.subtitle: Exploring the Perfect Unity of Form and Meaning
en.excerpt: Ximory Six Harmonies, from intention to form, painted with colors, marked with symbols, reflecting imagery, manifesting vitality.

zh.title: 心沐六和：归和｜念和在心 • 归和而明
zh.subtitle: 六和体系的完整呈现
zh.excerpt: 归和是六和体系的升华，当我们将六和融会贯通，内心自然归于和谐，智慧自然显现。念和在心，归和而明，这是修行的最终指向。

en.title: Ximory Six Harmonies: Return | Harmony in Mind, Clear in Return
en.subtitle: Complete Presentation of the Six Harmonies System
en.excerpt: Harmony in mind, clear in return. The complete framework of the Six Harmonies system.

zh.title: 心沐六和：第六篇｜无我和
zh.subtitle: 存在的和谐
zh.excerpt: 无内无外，无处不在；无拘无束，无处不在；心无所往，自然而然，生生不息。不再执着于存在，我开始真正存在。从我是到我无，超越自我限定，融入万物的自由流动。

en.title: Ximory Six Harmonies: Chapter Six | No-Self Harmony
en.subtitle: Harmony of Existence
en.excerpt: No inside, no outside, everywhere present; unbound, unrestricted, everywhere present; mind going nowhere, naturally so, endlessly alive.

zh.title: 能量和的修炼
zh.subtitle: 点燃内在的生命之火
zh.excerpt: 能量和是生命力的源泉，通过调养身心，我们可以点燃内在的生命之火，获得持续的成长动力。

en.title: Cultivation of Energy Harmony
en.subtitle: Igniting the Inner Fire of Life
en.excerpt: Energy Harmony is the source of vitality, through nurturing body and mind, we can ignite the inner fire of life and gain continuous growth momentum.

zh.title: 共频和的共振
zh.subtitle: 在协作中创造奇迹
zh.excerpt: 共频和让我们学会与他人、与系统同频共振，在协作中释放集体智慧，创造超越个体的奇迹。

en.title: Resonance of Frequency Harmony
en.subtitle: Creating Miracles in Collaboration
en.excerpt: Frequency Harmony teaches us to resonate with others and systems, releasing collective wisdom in collaboration and creating miracles beyond individual capacity.

zh.title: 无我和的超越
zh.subtitle: 融入无限的自由流动
zh.excerpt: 无我和是最高的境界，当我们放下自我的执着，就能融入万物的自由流动，体验真正的存在。

en.title: Transcendence of Selfless Harmony
en.subtitle: Merging into Infinite Free Flow
en.excerpt: Selfless Harmony is the highest realm, when we let go of self-attachment, we can merge into the free flow of all things and experience true existence.

zh.title: 六和的整合
zh.subtitle: 完整修行体系的实践指南
zh.excerpt: 六和体系是一个完整的修行框架，从自我觉醒到宇宙和谐，为现代人提供了系统的成长路径。

en.title: Integration of Six Harmonies
en.subtitle: Practice Guide for Complete Cultivation System
en.excerpt: The Six Harmonies system is a complete cultivation framework, from self-awakening to cosmic harmony, providing modern people with a systematic growth path.

zh.title: 心沐六和：归和
zh.subtitle: 念和在心 • 归和而明
zh.excerpt: 归和是六和体系的升华，当我们将六和融会贯通，内心自然归于和谐，智慧自然显现。

en.title: Ximory Six Harmonies: Return to Harmony
en.subtitle: Harmony in Mind • Return to Clarity
en.excerpt: Return to Harmony is the sublimation of the Six Harmonies system, when we integrate the six harmonies, the heart naturally returns to harmony and wisdom naturally manifests.

zh.title: 心沐六和：延伸
zh.subtitle: 形意和谐之美
zh.excerpt: 形意和谐是六和体系的延伸，探索形式与意义的完美统一，在美的体验中感悟生命的真谛。

en.title: Ximory Six Harmonies: Extension
en.subtitle: Beauty of Form and Meaning Harmony
en.excerpt: Form and meaning harmony is an extension of the Six Harmonies system, exploring the perfect unity of form and meaning, understanding the essence of life through the experience of beauty.

zh.title: 心沐六和：第六篇｜无我和
zh.excerpt: 无我和是最高的境界，当我们放下自我的执着，就能融入万物的自由流动，体验真正的存在。无内无外，无边无际，心无所往，自然而然。

zh.title: 心沐六和：第五篇｜共频和
zh.excerpt: 共频和让我们学会与他人、与系统同频共振，在协作中释放集体智慧，创造超越个体的奇迹。在同频共振中，我们共舞、共生、共创。

zh.title: 心沐六和：第四篇｜能量和
zh.excerpt: 能量和是生命力的源泉，通过调养身心，我们可以点燃内在的生命之火，获得持续的成长动力。回归身体的根，守住生命的气。

zh.title: 心沐六和：第三篇｜自然和
zh.excerpt: 自然和引导我们回归自然的节律，与四时变化保持同步，让身心在自然中得到滋养。随江河起落，合天地吐纳，偕四时流转，共万物生息。

zh.title: 心沐六和：第二篇｜社会和
zh.excerpt: 社会和教导我们如何在复杂的人际关系中保持内心的平衡，既不被外界裹挟，也不刻意对抗。建立真实连接，融入社会网络。

zh.title: 心沐六和：第一篇｜自我和
zh.excerpt: 自我和是六和体系的起点，通过与内在自我的深度对话，我们开始了解真实的自己。觉察自我本心，开启生命觉醒，脱下伪装，活出真实。

zh.title: 心沐六和：开篇｜六和体系介绍
zh.excerpt: 六和体系是一个完整的修行框架，从自我觉醒到宇宙和谐，为现代人提供了系统的成长路径。心沐六和，念和在心，归和而明。
